## NFTCollection.getCreators() method

Get the creators of this program.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCreators(): Promise<CreatorOutput[]>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[CreatorOutput](./sdk.creatoroutput.md)\[\]&gt;

program metadata

## Example

```jsx
const creators = await program.getCreators();
console.log(creators);
```
